data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Sheffield Wed get the game underway.
Callum Paterson heads in to make it 1-0 at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 13, Adam Reach instrumental with a fine assist.
He's off! Liam Shaw is shown a red card.
Lucas Joao (Reading) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Hillsborough Stadium.
In the minute 44, Ovie Ejaria with an assist there.
Oliver Langford blows to end the first-half.
Moses Odubajo is on a sub for Barry Bannan for Sheffield Wed.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Reading with the kick-off.
Tony Pulis is making the team's first substitution at Hillsborough Stadium with Joey Pelupessy replacing Liam Palmer.
Tony Pulis (Sheffield Wed) is making a second substitution, with Dominic Iorfa replacing Joost van Aken.
In the minute 53, Massimo Luongo (Sheffield Wed) has received a yellow card from Oliver Langford.
Callum Paterson (Sheffield Wed) has received a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Andy Rinomhota with Sone Aluko. This is the first substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
In the minute 70, Tomas Esteves is replacing Tom Holmes for Reading at Hillsborough Stadium.
Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a third substitution, with Sam Baldock replacing Michael Olise.
That's full-time at Hillsborough Stadium. The final score is 1-1.
Elias Kachunga is replacing Kadeem Harris for the home team.
